I am not joking we sat and listened to a long and obviously unrehearsed sales pitch then she requested a list of our friends and family that they could contact to sell air purifiers to. Needless to say I thanked them sarcastically for their time as they wasted my gas and time they had a copy of my resume for several days before this umm... I truly do not want to come off as a pompous jerk but this was a joke. I spoke with the other 2 young men both half my age gave them my phone number and now have a plan to help them create their resumes and hopefully help them find a decent job as I continue my quest. name: Doug Hartman
text:
Waste of my time. When I sat down with Jenny I told her what I was spending and what I wanted to spend per month for SEO and PPC. We spent an hour going over the company and what I have done in the past 30 years. I'm not new to the internet marketing game. I have worked with yodel and reach local and several other big players in the internet marketing. She emailed me my proposal very quickly but obviously did not listen to anything I said as her estimate was almost three times what I told her I wanted to spend per month at a total cost of over $6000. In addition to that, I was also quoted almost $15,000 for other services. While I did not use their service I feel it was a waste of my time to even meet with them.
I did receive a call under the guise of needing work done from their managing partner Nicole , asking why I left a negative review for them on Google if I did not pay them to do any work for me. I told her that I would go back on and I would modify my review so that people would understand I did not pay them but that my time was wasted in the phone calls, emails and meeting with them where obviously they did not listen to a word I had to say. This is why I left a negative review for them. They might do a wonderful job in marketing and advertising but I will never know because I will not use them.

resp.text:
Doug,

We are disappointed to hear of your frustration with our consultation process and the speediness in which we sent the proposal.

Our goal is to provide tailored strategies for every client based on their specific situation, needs, and goals. Our recommendations are always based on what we believe will specifically help your business achieve online success and may sometimes go beyond stated budgets.

We hope you're able to find a solution that is a better fit for your needs - and wish you luck in your business adventures!

Thank you for your input, your time in the call, and your revised review.

name: Doug Marshall
text:
As CFO of the Alabama Family Trust, we came to Uptick Marketing with an outdated website that was not mobile compatible, responsive, or easy to use.  In short, it needed an overhaul.  AFT is a 501c3 organization created under Alabama Statute to administer special needs trusts for children and adults with disabilities, protecting their assets in a SNT to help enable Medicaid eligibility. While this area of the law can be very complicated, the team at Uptick Marketing was invaluable in helping design our new website so that viewers could more easily navigate our website and better understand how AFT operates to serve individuals with disabilities.  Uptick provided us both the technical expertise to create the website and the marketing creativity to build it in the best way to reach those most in need of our services.

As the former VP/Controller of Alagasco, Chair-Alagasco IT Initiative Council, and Member-Energen Corporation IT Steering Committee, I have worked with many strong, talented IT professionals on multiple IT projects during my career at Energen/Alagasco, and the professionals at Uptick Marketing are right in there with them.  Nicole Beachum, Jerry Brown, and the entire Uptick team did a GREAT job and were EASY to work with.  Their pricing is very fair, and we are looking forward to a long-term partnership together as they are now completely handling our social media management.

These guys are true professionals - ON THEIR GAME, TOP OF SHELF TEAM, REALLY FUN TO WORK WITH, AND ALWAYS HAVE GREAT COFFEE FOR OUR STRATEGY MEETINGS!   ---- Doug Marshall, CFO of Alabama Family Trust

name: Andrea M. Kring
text:
When we buy a car, we consider so many details that will reflect our individuality.  The make, model, color, price, even the tires are elements that ultimately reflect what is important to each of us.  Can you imagine not considering the engine?  What good is our vehicle if we don’t have structural integrity under the hood? It would be nothing more than a pretty yard ornament and certainly wouldn’t take you far.

I was drawn to Strong Automotive because I could see it had structural integrity.  I watched the company for over a year before I decided to consider working with them.  On the exterior, it looked bright, energetic, and fun.  When I took a look under the hood, I found in this agency a diverse, highly creative, and dedicated group of people who want one thing:  to be kind of engine that drives customers to your product. Every department at this agency works closely together like a well-oiled machine (pun intended) that is always being tweaked and improved to make sure it runs smoother and faster than the day before.

When you consider Strong to represent your business, you can know that the people who make up the company truly love what they do and they are excited about working for you.  Thanks to John Paul Strong, we have a work environment that allows us to be that high-quality engine you need to drive clients to your business. #WEARESTRONG

resp.text: Hi Shelley! You know how much I appreciate you and your kind words. It pains me that small business owners spend their advertising and marketing dollars where they are ineffective. I hear horror stories like these from potential clients on a regular basis. I always advise them, whether they hire me or not, to "do this and do that" and "ask this and ask that" BEFORE selecting their next marketing agency. There are simply too many marketing service providers that over promise and under deliver, selling services that they know are not in the best interest of their clients. Even worse, many so-called "web marketing" agencies are experienced only with "traditional" marketing such as print, radio, or television, but expanded their services into the web arena in order to survive (or be more profitable). While most of these agencies are excellent at providing "traditional" marketing services, many of them are wholly unqualified to provide any type of online marketing services. They might be able to produce a "pretty" website, but that is a far cry from what is required to implement a successful, comprehensive web marketing campaign. Thanks again for leaving a review and allowing me to vent :-), Vernon Blake - Internet Marketing Specialist

I trust them implicitly and thank them for always being available when we need them.

In this day and age, it’s so nice to be able to do business with honest, decent, upstanding folks like these.

For the 7th year in a row, we have won the TripAdvisor award for best restaurant in Prattville.
- - - -
My restaurant is off the beaten path in downtown Prattville, AL making it a challenge to attract new customers. In the past, I paid to advertise in the local newspaper, print magazines, print and Internet yellow pages and an online paid listing, with limited success. I hired Bizeeo over 2 years ago (October 2012) to market my restaurant online.

They manage my website, social media, business listings and online reviews (reputation management). Since then, growth has exceed 25% for 2 consecutive years.  Due to our success with Bizeeo Marketing, I've discontinued all other forms of advertising.

Also, this year (2015), our restaurant won TripAdvisor's Certificate of Excellence award (out of 99 restaurants). This is the 3rd year in a row we have won this award. I highly recommend Bizeeo - you can see for yourself online what they've done for us.

resp.text: Hi Mickey, we have learned so much about online marketing (we are ALWAYS learning) while maintaining your website and other web properties. Of course, the foundation of it all is we are fortunate enough to work with a business owner that KNOWS what customer satisfaction is all about. text:
Used their services several times. Every single time, they tell me it will be ready at a time and date. I show up after that time to pick it up, walk in, and it is NEVER READY! THIS IS EXTREMELY FRUSTRATING. No, I do not want to return later. No I do not want to sit in the lobby and wait for you to make it happen. Have it ready when you say it will be ready.

Last time I was there the manager said, "I thought I told you it would be ready tomorrow" I proceeded to read him the email he sent to me the day before saying it would be ready. He said "oh, I'll have it in 5 minutes"

I have decided to go with another printer.
